thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: Miranda Palmer
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by Miranda Palmer

author: Miranda Palmer
title: Miranda Palmer
text: I recently went to a things engraved in the Burlington area. I had an item that I purchased at the store engraved, but while they were supposed to be engraving it, they informed me that their machine broke. They then told me I had to come back and get my item and drive it to another things engraved location in order to have the work done. VERY INCONVENIENT. As a customer, it seemed like the staff didn't even care about the inconvenience, they didn't even apologize.
